Title: Baio and Switch
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Alex Barnow, Lacey Marisa Friedman (story)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: As Beverly promises to bring Scott Baio to Jenkintown for Hands Across America, Adam ends up with two dates to the same dance.
